ai-layer.title: AI Layer
ai-layer.description: The AI layer is the intelligent level of GeniVerse that supports learning personalization, content adaptation, and intelligent assistance to students and educators throughout the learning process. It is built on modern machine learning and data processing approaches and operates as a set of specialized services integrated into the platform.

core-capabilities.title: Core Platform Capabilities
core-capabilities.description: GeniVerse provides a comprehensive set of functional capabilities to support personalized, scalable, and pedagogically sound learning processes. All platform components work as interconnected modules of a unified educational ecosystem.

design-system.title: Design System
design-system.description: The GeniVerse design system forms a cohesive visual language and component library that ensures consistency, accessibility, and a modern user experience across all platforms and interfaces.

modularity-deployment.title: Modularity and Deployment
modularity-deployment.description: GeniVerse is built on a modular architecture. This allows deploying the platform differently: as cloud SaaS, as local installation (on-prem), in hybrid configuration, or with edge components for low-latency scenarios.

pedagogical-framework.title: Pedagogical Model
pedagogical-framework.description: The GeniVerse pedagogical model is based on a combination of several learning theories, including behaviorist, cognitive, constructivist, and social approaches, as well as activity theory, experiential and self-regulated learning. This approach allows adapting the learning process to different educational contexts and student needs.

product-principles.title: Product Principles
product-principles.description: GeniVerse is developed based on a set of key principles that define the approach to interface design, feature development, and user interaction organization.

roles-permissions.title: Roles and Permissions
roles-permissions.description: GeniVerse uses a multi-level access management model that combines role-based, attribute-based, and contextual approaches. This ensures security, flexibility, and compliance with educational and regulatory requirements.

safety-ethics-compliance.title: Safety, Ethics, and Compliance
safety-ethics-compliance.description: GeniVerse adheres to high standards of security, ethical AI use, and regulatory compliance. This section describes the platform's approach to protecting students, maintaining privacy, transparent AI application, and meeting legal and industry standard requirements.

xr-immersive.title: XR and Immersiveness
xr-immersive.description: GeniVerse can use extended reality (XR) technologies — virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and mixed reality (MR) — as an additional tool for visualizing complex topics, practical simulations, and learning through interaction.
